attributes.action: Stop motorcycle road tax or lower the tax  as most motorcycle are only used
attributes.additional_details: It's the white thing to do the motorcycle dose not course traffic jams and pollute like cars lorry bus vans and big 4x4s and motorcycle do not take up loads of parking spaces.
attributes.background:
Cut or lower motorcycle road tax for the UK as most are only used for the summer season also most of motorcycle are not lifted on the road there locked away in garages or other out buildings .
Motorcycle save on congestion and us less room on the roads also do fare less damage to the road

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303926
